xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/296834-An Alternative Reality: The Football Manager Documentary 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/m2i30JQsHvbjg1pTelYJdCmfIhx.jpg "It’s the story of the people who escape to the alternative reality of being a football manager, and the effect this has had on their lives. It’s also the story of how a computer game made by football fans has become a part of the world it set out to replicate." - Miles Jacobson An Alternative Reality: The Football Manager Documentary
